name: xShrap
description: xShrap is the cross chain wrapper of Shrapnel (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/shrapnel). There are currently incentivized farms on Arbitrum (because of MCLBs ve(3,3) strategy) with plans to incentivize farms on OP, AVAX, BSC and Polygon. The underlying token (Shrapnel) will eventually be used as the reward token for Bombswap v2, collecting fees from the DEX and the other games on Bombswap v2. Shrapnel currently has no emissions as the rewards have been paused pending future upgrades to the DEX.
